# About

This collection of R Markdown websites show the checklist-based indicators of Alien Species in Belgium and it is part of [TrIAS project](https://osf.io/7dpgr/).

The next sections are taken into account:

1. [Data retrieval](build_checklist_indicators.html)
2. [New introductions per year](indicator_introductions_per_year.html) (indicator)
3. [Cumulative number of new introductions](indicator_cumulative_number.html) (indicator)
4. [Pathways of introduction](indicator_pathways.html) (indicator)
